name: Aloe Vera
description: A hardy succulent known for its medicinal gel, often used to soothe burns and skin irritations.

name: Lavender
description: A fragrant herb with purple flowers, valued for its calming aroma and use in essential oils.

name: Snake Plant
description: A low-maintenance indoor plant with tall, striking leaves that help purify the air.

name: Rosemary
description: A woody herb with needle-like leaves, popular for culinary use and its invigorating scent.

name: Fiddle Leaf Fig
description: A trendy houseplant with large, glossy leaves that add a bold aesthetic to any space.

name: Basil
description: A fragrant culinary herb commonly used in Italian dishes, known for its sweet and peppery flavor.

name: Jade Plant
description: A resilient succulent with thick, glossy leaves, believed to bring good luck and prosperity.

name: Mint
description: A fast-growing herb with a refreshing scent, often used in teas, cocktails, and desserts.

name: Peace Lily
description: A graceful indoor plant with elegant white blooms, known for improving indoor air quality.

name: Eucalyptus
description: An aromatic plant with silvery-green leaves, often used in herbal remedies and spa treatments.
